name: Hairdo Valley
description:
Catch hairs, replant them and water them, and help our friend here to keep his hair. 

CONTROLS:

1 to equip your basket (to catch the falling hairs!)

2  to equip your hoe (to replant the hairs!)

3 to equip your watering can (to water the hairs!)

LMB to plant and water!

There's no win state yet, because I have no idea what that would even be. Any feedback is welcome!!
